about.label: About Me
about.title: Curious about me? Here you have it.
about.description:
I'm a Mobile Developer with over Three Years of Experience building applications across government, industrial, and enterprise sectors. I’m passionate about SOLID principles and Clean Architecture, and have contributed to both end-user products and internal mobile libraries (SDKs). Skilled at working independently and collaboratively, I'm committed to continuously growing in the mobile engineering space.

My background includes a Bachelor's degree in Informatics Engineering from Universitas Dian Nuswantoro, with academic focus on machine learning and mobile cybersecurity. Outside of mobile, I’ve also developed web and desktop applications using a variety of modern technologies and frameworks, ensuring clean, maintainable, and scalable solutions.
